error.message: Call to deprecated constant CONFIG_SYNC_DIRECTORY: Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Site\Settings::get('config_sync_directory') instead.
Call to deprecated function config_get_config_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Site\Settings::get('config_sync_directory') instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to yaml2php.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
